High Quality Material: This Women’s Jewellery Set is made of White Gold Plated ,Main stone is Created Blue Sapphire ,Side stone is White cubic zirconia. High Polished. Nickel-free, Hypoallergenic and Shiny Forever. Will not change the color, health and environmental protection.
Adjustable Size: Necklace length: 17.71″+1.97″, Bracelet Length: 7.09″+0.79″,Ring Size :Adjustable . We specially add extension chains for necklaces and bracelets, So that different sizes can be applied, Necklaces and Pendants can be separated, You can change the necklace you like.
Special Occasion Accessories:These wedding jewelry sets are Stunning and Elegant, Suitable for Wedding-Engagement-Party-Ball-Prom-Pageant-Cocktail-Date Night.Come with a nice gift box and a jewelry pouch, It‚Äôs a perfect gift for your Lovers, Mother, Daughter, Sister, Wife, Fiancee, Couple, Friends or Yourself on Anniversary-Valentines Day-Birthday-Christmas-Xmas Day.
Protection and Service: Please stay away from chemicals and keep the accessories dry. The product will always stay shiny. If you have any questions about this product, Please feel free to contact us. We will do our best to promise you a wonderful shopping experience.

About LMXXVJ jewelry

Meet you, Meet love.

An amazing encounter, a lifetime companion.

LMXXVJ has been focusing on fashion jewelry accessories, using high-quality cubic zirconia and semi-precious stones and exquisite craftsmanship to make exquisite jewelry. We hope that our jewelry will bring you good luck and a happy life.

All accessories are made of materials that are harmless to the human body to create a comfortable wearing experience for you.

For more earrings, ear clips, necklaces, bracelets, weddings, dance parties, anniversaries, Valentine’s Day jewelry sets, etc., please enter LMXXVJ STORE.

Electroplating Process

The product uses five-layer electroplating platinum, which can better protect the health of the product and the user.

Bracelet Extension Clasp

All bracelets are equipped with a 0.79″ extension buckle, which can fit different sizes of wrists.

Necklace extension chain

Each necklace and pendant can be disassembled. You can change the necklace yourself, and the necklace adds a 1.97″ extension chain, which is convenient for users to match different clothes.

LMXXVJ uses AAAAA grade cubic zirconia. Each stone is polished by experienced craftsmen. Each stone is specially selected to show the perfect cut surface, just to give you the best blessings.

Date First Available ‚Äè : ‚Äé March 3, 2020
Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé CDE
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B085DDMN7Z

MOTHER’S DAY CHRISTMAS GIFTS FOR WOMEN Comes in a CDE mom jewelry gift box. No wrapping needed. Perfect for gift giving
DESIGN Dark Red heart Crystal wrapped in the angel wing base on which there are many small zircons inlaid. Through such a combination of crystals and zircons, The whole necklace presents the shape of the angel heart.
MATERIALSWhite Gold Plated. Hypoallergenic, Lead-Free, Nickel-Free, passed Swiss SGS Inspection Standard, no harm to health. A+ Stones all appear to be securely set. Embellished with Austrian Crystals are inlaid into the metal by hand, This women gifts for Mothers Day will stay sturdy and not be fell off easily.
SPECIFICATIONS Pendant: 1.45 inch(L)/1.61 inch(H)/0.27 inch(W); Adjustable Chain:16+2 inch; Weight: 0.42 ounces
MATCHING The combination of heart shape crystals add an irresistible sparkle to your daily look. It is a perfect match to evening gown, cocktail dress, wedding dress or blouse and jeans

CDE has its own factory with over 10 years professional experience and lots of jewelry technology patents.

CDE‚Äôs vision is bringing the high-quality products and services that exceed our customers' desires.

Each item is a precious artworkÔºÅ

MAINTENANCE INSTRUCTION

Keep your jewelry in your CDE box at the end of the day.

Do not spray perfume directly on the jewelry

Do not immerse your jewelry in liquid.

After wearing the necklace, wipe it with a soft flannel cloth before putting them away.

Minor tarnish can be lightly buffed off with a jewelry polishing cloth(you can find the cloth in the gift box) or a mild jewelry cleaner.

Details

Mermaid color Heart-shaped stunning and shining crystal wrapped in the Platinum Plated angel wing, glitters and sparkles. The dazzling necklace represents the symbol FOREVER LOVE and the faith of Guardian. Go get wearing it and enjoy the stunning sparkle and all the compliments

Lobster Clasp

Necklace is SEPARATED with the chain so that you could make a change if you'd like to update the collocation and it is adjustable with a chain 17.71 in+1.97 in. No worry about the necklace would not fit

Gift Box

This Angel Wings necklace comes in an elegant jewelry gift box, Great gifts for daughter, gifts for women, gifts for mom, gifts for wife, gifts for aunt, gifts for best friend, etc. Ideal Birthday Gifts, Anniversary Gifts,Christmas Gifts,Thanksgiving gifts, Graduation Gifts, Mother's Day Gifts, Valentine's Day Gifts, etc, or just as a surprise to remind that special one how much you care!

Crystals from Austrian Crystals

These glittering crystals shimmer with the slightest movement and sparkle even in the lowest light settings.

Shining Jewelry Brighten Up Your Brilliant Life

A Romantic and Gorgeous Loving Gift , Keeping those we love close to us, and sharing this good energy and love with others.

GIFTS FOR WOMEN: The dainty heart necklace comes with a beautiful gift box, a gift bag, a round card and an adorable little Envelope, ready for giving. And our packaging is 99% biodegradable. Perfect gifts for your mom, wife, girlfriend, daughter, sister, friend on Birthday, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day or other special days.
MATERIALS: The chain and pendant are both made of 925 Sterling Silver. This is a high quality stuff that will not turn your skin to green, red or itchy. The chain is strong enough to wear for a long time.
SIZE: Chain is 18inches + 2 inches (Adjustable). This length works on practically anyone. It‚Äôs a excellent gift choice for women or girls daily wearing home or office.
AFTER – SALES SERVICE: We are committed to providing a 90-day refund service. If you are interested in or question the birthstone necklace, please contact us in time. We will reply you within 24 hours and give you a satisfactory answer.

BEST GIFTS FOR WOMEN


I LOVE YOU FOR ALWAYS & FOREVER

Birthstone Necklace for Women

GIFTS FOR WOMEN

Unique necklace send to the special women in your life and let her know how much she means to you. At the center of the heart pendant is a birthstone and it represents the month of her birth. When she wear this heart pendant necklace, she genuinely happy for this little surprise. Perfect gifts for your mom, grandma, wife, girlfriend, daughter, sister or any other awesome lady on Birthday, Mother’s Day, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, Anniversary or other special days.



925 Sterling Silver

DAINTY NECKLACES FOR WOMEN

The chain and pendant are both made of 925 Sterling Silver. This is a high quality stuff that will not turn your skin to green, red or itchy. The chain is strong enough and will not break.

  1. January-April

    Birthstone Necklaces for Women

    • Garnet in January means Chastity, Friendship, Fidelity.
    • Amethyst in February means Chastity, Courage, Honesty.
    • Aquamarine in March means Composure, Courage, Happiness.
    • White Topaz in April means Firm and Eternal Love.


  2. May-August

    Birthstone Necklaces for Women

    • Emerald in May means Kindness, Confidence, Kindness, Happiness.
    • Alexandrite in June means Healthy and long life.
    • Ruby in July means Love, Passion, Radiance.
    • Peridot In August removes people’s fears and gives the wearer a happy marriage.


  3. September-December

    Birthstone Necklaces for Women

    • Sapphire in September means Loyalty, Steadfastness, Love and Honesty.
    • Pink Sapphire in October means strong.
    • Citrine in November means Sincere and Friendly.
    • Tanzanite in December means joyful.


Buyer Show


Is it made cheaply or is it high quality?

The pendant and chain of this necklace are made of 925 sterling silver, high quality.

What if my necklace breaks?

In the case of non-human intentional damage, your necklace has a broken chain or faded pendant, please let us know and we will send you a new necklace as compensation.

How can I take care of my necklace?

1.Try not to leave the necklace in the water for a long time

2.Do not wear the necklace for strenuous exercise, sweat will reduce the life of the necklace.

3.When you are not wearing it, please wipe it with a soft cloth and store it in a jewelry box.

What is this package?

The birthstone necklace comes with an IEFIL gift bag, an IEFIL jewelry box, a little envelopes, a thank you card and a silver polishing cloth. Ready for give as a gift.

About IEFIL JEWELRY?

IEFIL JEWELRY is a creative jewelry company and we have our own jewelry designers and factories.

Welcome to join us, we are glad to see you share your valuable suggestions about our products.

Long-Lasting Feeding: The 5L/21 Cups food storage will keep most pets comfortably fed for several weeks. The double bowl food dispenser is a perfect solution to feed 2 cats at same time and and won’ t have any fights.
Voice Record Meal Call: The auto feeder allows you to record a 10s short voice message when it‚Äôs mealtime to create a strong bond and makes your pets fed regularly, feeling safe with well cared even when you‚Äôre absent. Due to the setting lock of the LCD screen, pets can‚Äôt play with or mess up programming.
Dual Power Protection: The pet food dispenser works with a 5V DC adapter, also stores three D-size batteries (NOT included) as a backup power supply. Unplanned power outages won’t interrupt the your feeder’s programming and deprive your furry friend of dinner. Giving you more holiday flexibility.
Safe and Reliable Feeder: A desiccant bag and the secure lock lid not only keeps the food fresh but also prevents your pet from accessing stored food. The detachable design allows a thorough cleaning to reduce bacterial growth, makes your life easier and pets healthier.

From the brand

With hundreds of different brands coming out every day, it’s easy to get stuck in a rut. In search of a breakthrough point, Coquimbo pursues the development of high quality products to please consumers with superior products and excellent after-sales service. We focus on developing led work light, which will be different from traditional work light in that it has more features for use. We aim to make better products for our users.

Compact & Portable

Meticulous Work

Emergency Lighting

Nighttime Car Repair

Durable Material: This led work light is made of hard rubber, anti-sweat and anti-slip, the head is aluminum which dissipates the heat effectively, prolong the life of the lamp. Thanks to the foldable design, the lamp is easy to carry, and save storage space
5 Modes & Rechargeable: Built-in rechargeable battery, rechargeable by USB port ( included usb cable), you don’t need to buy another battery, this will save you cost, time and effort. has 5 Lighting modes: High Brightness / Medium Brightness / Front Light / Red Warning / Strobe Red.(long press the switch button to switch to red light modes)
360 Degree Rotary, Magnet Base & Hook: 360 degree rotate provide multi-angle illumination, magnet base and hook make your hand free to do other things in the night. It can be used for BBQ, camping, reading, car repair and any other things you would want to do at night.
Portable and Versatility: It’s very compact at 5.8″ folded and mere 4.9 oz in weight (140 gr), They’re small enough that they can fit in many different places. 3 white light modes can be use as a flashlight, work light, grill light, 2 red light modes can be use as an alert light.
What You Get: Package included 2 Rechargeable Work Light and 2 USB cable. It is a practical tool can use on daily time and outdoor active, It also can be used as a gift for friend or family member.

Control Your Comfort and Your Color Scheme, or use your tablet or computer. All you need is a Wi-Fi connection, or use the free app for smartphone/tablet to manage thermostat remotely and take advantage of savings when away and maintain comfort when home. Simple setup takes the hassle out of programming your thermostat. You can also control thermostat using the touch screen and change the background color to match your paint color or personal preference. Your RTH9585WF features flexible seven day programming, energy savings mode, an indoor humidity sensor, and voice command through the Total Connect Comfort app.
COMFORT COMES IN YOUR COLOR. Personalize your Wi-Fi Smart Color Programmable Thermostat to fit your d√©cor.
SAVE ENERGY AND GET REWARDED by checking with your energy provider about available energy savings rebates to save on your purchase (use rebate finder link above). Plus, eligible customers can enroll in ongoing energy savings incentives with their energy provider to keep saving all year long.
YOUR SCHEDULE. YOUR WAY. Flexible programming options for your schedule or utility company‚Äôs peak rate pricing.
EASY OPERATION AND INTUITIVE. Bright, easy-to-read touchscreen makes for simple operation.
COMPATIBLE WITH: Forced air (gas, oil or electric), hot water and steam, and heat pumps with electric backup. Does NOT work with electric baseboard heat (120-240V). C-Wire required.
ENERGY STAR certified. Help save energy, track your heating and cooling with monthly energy reports and get personalized tips on reducing energy use.
Before purchasing, check to see if this thermostat is compatible with your home and to determine if your home needs a C-wire power adapter.
Works with most heat/cool oil furnace systems. Will not work with heating only oil furnace systems unless a C-Wire is present.

Customizable

A thermostat for your decor

The full-color display can be customized to fit your unique style, with color selection to match your home’s d√©cor. Enjoy versatility and performance with this smart home thermostat.

This Wi-Fi Thermostat also allows you to create a custom temperature schedule for every day of the week. When schedules change, you can temporarily update the settings with ease. Plus, with it’s smart response technology, it learns your preferences, helping it achieve your preferred temperature when you need it.

App compatibility

You‚Äôre in control from anywhere

Choose from the Total Connect Comfort app or the Resideo app to control your Wi-Fi thermostat anytime, anywhere. You will also receive intelligent alerts, such as air filter and humidifier pad change reminders.

Easily connect your Wi-Fi Smart Color Thermostat with compatible voice assistant devices like Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, Microsoft Cortana, and more.
